lead_paragraph: A gunslinger settles down with a new wife, and becomes the marshal of a little town. His new life comes crashing to an end when a murderous outlaw robs the town bank, injures the marshal, then rapes and kills his new wife. The marshal is then assigned to save some widowed women from ruthless banditos. He recruits a journalist and five hardened convicts to help him stop them.
